reviewText: When someone buy a wrong dvd region PLEASE DO NOT give a bad review, it is misleading. The review help customer making a decision on a purchase, they do not want to see a 1 stars because the person bought the wrong region. This is a very good dvd.

I ordered this item as it says it is Region 1 in the Product Details of the listing.  Well, it is not, I tried to play it on 3 different DVD players. This will not work in Region 1.

I am sure the video is great, Dalida is a legend!  But I could not watch it.
